name: Caravan
notes: Default executable is set for 64 bit systems. If running on a 32 bit system, you need to manually set "caravan/Caravan.x86" as the executable.

files.game: N/A: Select the .zip archive downloaded from Humble Bundle

content:
exe: Caravan.x86_64
files:
- game: 'N/A: Select the .zip archive downloaded from Humble Bundle'
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: game
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $CACHE/Caravan_1.1.17513_Full_DEB_Multi_Daedalic_ESD.tar.gz
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/Caravan
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/Caravan.x86_64
